TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebFormReferenceManager

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager. The WebFormsReferenceManager contains additional functionality and allows for more extensibility. To get the WebFormsReferenceManager use the RootDesigner.ReferenceManager property from your ControlDesigner. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Provides an interface that can look up information about the types used in the current Web Forms project.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The IWebFormReferenceManager interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class for equivalent designer functionality.
A Web Forms document designer must implement this interface. Implementing this interface enables a designer to manage references and provide information related to Web Forms controls within the project.

MemberSignature.Value: public Type GetObjectType (string tagPrefix, string typeName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetObjectType(string tagPrefix, string typeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The tag prefix for the type.
Docs.summary: Gets the type of the specified object.
Docs.returns: The <xref:System.Type> of the object, if it could be resolved.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The GetObjectType method is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager.GetType%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class for equivalent designer functionality.

Docs.summary: Gets the register directives for the current project.
Docs.returns: The register directives for the current project.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The GetRegisterDirectives method is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager.GetRegisterDirectives%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class for equivalent designer functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetTagPrefix(class System.Type objectType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the tag prefix for the specified type of object.
Docs.returns: The tag prefix for the specified object type, if it could be located.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The GetTagPrefix method is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager.GetTagPrefix%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class for equivalent designer functionality.
